notes.text:
This update for frr fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-46752: Fixed denial of service caused by mishandling malformed MP_REACH_NLRI data (bsc#1216627).
- CVE-2023-46753: Fixed denial of service caused by crafted BGP UPDATE messages (bsc#1216626).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: An issue was discovered in FRRouting FRR through 9.0.1. A crash can occur for a crafted BGP UPDATE message without mandatory attributes, e.g., one with only an unknown transit attribute.
